	Proven ability to meet or exceed sales targets.
	Good understanding of the Makurdi real estate market.

Salary

Business Development Executive Job at Homland Ivy Homes Limited




        
    

        
        Homland Ivy Homes Limited, a Real Estate Development & Investment Company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive
Job Location: Makurdi, Benue
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Business Development Executive will be responsible for generating leads, closing property sales, managing client relationships, and identifying new market opportunities for Homland Ivy Homes Ltd.
	The role requires a proactive individual with strong sales skills and knowledge of the real estate market.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Identify and pursue new sales opportunities for residential and commercial properties.
	Generate leads through field marketing, referrals, digital platforms, and networking.
	Promote Homland Ivy Homes Ltd properties to prospective clients.
	Conduct property inspections, site visits, and client presentations.
	Maintain strong relationships with existing and prospective clients.
	Negotiate sales terms and close deals in line with company policies.
	Collaborate with marketing teams to support promotional campaigns.
	Maintain accurate records of leads, sales activities, and client interactions.
	Provide weekly and monthly sales performance reports.
	Represent the company at property exhibitions, open houses, and networking events.


Selection Criteria


	OND/HND/Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
	1–3 years of experience in sales or business development (real estate experience is an advantage).
	Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Proven ability to meet or exceed sales targets.
	Good understanding of the Makurdi real estate market.
	Self-motivated, target-driven, and results-oriented.


Salary
N100,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: clinikhr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Location:&nbsp;Palmgrove, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary

	Analyze operational data to identify improvement areas
	Develop and implement process improvements to boost efficiency and reduce costs
	Lead a team of logistics coordinators and drivers
	Ensure compliance with company policies, safety standards, and regulatory requirements.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s degree in Logistics, Supply Chain, or related field with&nbsp;5+ years of experience in logistics and operations management
	Proven track record of improving operational efficiency
	Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
	Experience with logistics software and data analysis tools


Salary

Logistics & Operations Manager Job at Rapid Rentals Limited




        
    

        
        Rapid Rentals is a specialist provider of soundproof generators for hire or purchase. Our fleet ranges from 30Kva to 500Kva and we are able to power uo to 1500Kva in a single event. We are an indigenous company with long affliiations in both events and facilities management industrieswhich gives us a unique ability to leverage resources to the benefit of our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistics & Operations Manager

Job Location: Palmgrove, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We're looking for an experienced Logistics and Operations Manager to oversee our rental operations, ensuring seamless delivery and collection of assets to clients. If you're a problem-solver with a knack for process optimization.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan,scheduleand oversee the deployment and collection of generators and related equipment.
	Coordinate with clients, drivers, and warehouse teams for smooth operations
	Monitor inventory levels, track asset movement, and optimize utilization
	Analyze operational data to identify improvement areas
	Develop and implement process improvements to boost efficiency and reduce costs
	Lead a team of logistics coordinators and drivers
	Ensure compliance with company policies, safety standards, and regulatory requirements.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain, or related field with 5+ years of experience in logistics and operations management
	Proven track record of improving operational efficiency
	Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
	Experience with logistics software and data analysis tools


Salary
N300,000 - N400,000 / Month.
